propChildren: While you can pass any node as children, the main use case is for an img.
propClasses: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
propCols: Width of the item in number of grid columns.
propComponent:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propRows: Height of the item in number of grid rows.
stylesRoot: Styles applied to the root element.
stylesImg: Styles applied to an `img` element to ensure it covers the item.
stylesStandard: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="standard"`.
stylesWoven: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="woven"`.
